Entries.AcceptGift_(O)68: $c 0.5#Oh, wow... Thank you! This colour perfectly captures my mood today.$h#The warm, soothing energy of this stone helps us re-centre our thoughts... It's actually just what I needed on a day like this. Thanks!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)64: $c 0.5#Wow, look at that colour! It matches perfectly with my outfit.$h#Oh, this is perfect... I've been feeling a little sluggish lately. Rubies are great for energising the spirit!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)60: $c 0.5#Oh!... Heheh... I know exactly why you gave me this stone today. Very interesting...#Wow, it's beautiful! This colour makes me think of all the spiritual power within the forest... Can you feel that wood energy?
Entries.divorced: @... You broke my heart... I just can't talk to you any more.$s#$e#Please, let me try to heal...$s
Entries.Wed: I've heard rumours of rare and powerful magic rings, forged long ago by forgotten civilisations. I'm not sure if it's true or just a fairy tale.
Entries.Sun4: This house was left in our care by my parents. They've been travelling the world for the last two years.#$e#We have no idea when they'll be back.#$e#I enjoy living here, though. It's a beautiful area and the town is nice.
Entries.fall_Thu8: I think Clint's mad at me. He never looks at me any more...$u#$e#I always thought we were friends.$u
Entries.winter_Wed: Haley and I aren't made for such a big house. It's a hassle to keep it clean.#$e#Ah well. I really shouldn't be complaining.#$e#Your farmhouse seems nice and cosy.$h
